entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v7.0.7
entry.content:

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.0.1
entry.content:
üö® Breaking Changes

üöÄ This is a major feature which introduces agents and swarm mode. - Implements swarm mode with agents - by Amir Raminfar in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3058 (4de9c)

üêû Bug Fixes

  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies - by renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3055 (806af)
  • Update dependency daisyui to ^4.12.7 - by renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3056 (9b87c)
  • Update dependency entities to v5 - by renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3060 (89f85)
  • Update all non-major dependencies - by renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3064 (26e4d)
  • Update all non-major dependencies - by renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3065 (2e5fb)

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.0.2
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Removes empty stacks  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3071 (6246b)
  • Improves memory leak in new container stream  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3076 (ce2b0)
  • deps: Update all non-major dependencies  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3073 (00f2c)
